resources.string: Do you want to know what things did you do last life?
Come with me fellow stranger, I will tell you who you were…
Please, I need this information so bad!
Tell me, how others calls you? Do you have a name?
I need to know the date you came to this world.
What animal do you prefer as your companion?
I can see something in your mind now… You would rather live in…
I like you. Choose a gift.
